metadata.title: DPM Dar meets Russian FM on sidelines of ASEAN Forum

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Jul 10 (APP):Deputy PM/Foreign Minister, Senator Ishaq Dar on Thursday met Russian FM Sergey Lavrov on the sidelines of the 32nd ASEAN Regional Forum in Kuala Lumpur. They reaffirmed their commitment to further strengthening of bilateral relations and agreed to meet again next week during SCO council of Ministers meeting, a DPM's Office news release said.
